name: BHAVANARUSHI BAHUDDESHIYA SANSTHA

address: D45 3 Midc Near Old Kumbhari Naka Solapur

briefDescription: MissionBHAVANARUSHI BHAUDDESHIYA SANSTHA SOLAPUR, is committed to social justice, sustainable development & human rights and undertakes educational activities & programs for people who belong to poor & rural areas; provides education, training and guidance for rehabilitation. Aims & Objectives of the OrganizationThe most effective way to reduce poverty is to make people employable and capable of being engaged in income generation activities. Education â€“ both formal and vocational is the basic requirement for making people employable. In order to make their employment sustainable they need to have access to healthcare facilities, shelter, clean environment and an urge to lead a decent life.
